content.c_answer2: Only Fools and Horses The Musical is 2 hours 30 minutes (incl. interval). Performances starting at 2:30pm finish at approx. 5pm, and performances starting at 7:30pm finish at approx. 10pm
content.name: How long is Only Fools and Horses The Musical and when does it finish?
content.question: How long is Only Fools and Horses The Musical and when does it finish?
